name: Lightjams
description: Lightjams is a lighting control program for Windows that offers a free trial version.
It includes a Fixture Editor for creating and editing fixture definitions.
Fixtures are saved as XML files in a straightforward format.
They support various fixture types including RGB/RGBW fixtures, moving heads, and complex multi-channel fixtures.
fixtureUsage: Open the Fixture Editor and import the downloaded XML file.
Fixtures will be saved to the fixtures library.
